titles.title: I have hope in my heart for a better resurrection,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I have hope in my heart for a better resurrection,
I have faith for that final victory;
I believe that, with God, all things are possible,
All things are possible for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For I've seen mountains removed and cast into the sea,
I've seen faith like a mustard seed defeat the enemy,
I've cried unto God, for I've seen God deliver,
I have hope, for I see victory.
